Directions: After cleansing the face, apply a small amount to the entire face and neck. Avoid applying to the eye area. Seal with your moistuizer. Shake Well

Warnings: For External Use Only

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
